resources.string:
Hello, my name is Ertuğrul 
\ I am 22 years old. 
\ I live in Istanbul. 
\ I like to play football. 
\ I am studying Computer Science in Ozyegin University. 
\ I like Python and Java mostly, but trying to learn Kotlin. 
\ I want to create Android Applications as a Mobile developer
